err.. im no linux guru.. try fix broken packages..
err.. i just installed it.. its python-matplotlib.. or try reloading the repos
thats bad, i just searched synaptic matplotlib & dependencies are just a click away, i think windows should get one too dont you?
Dep hunting is really simple in linux, i can install right off the repository, i wonder if there is a package manager for windows
i actually wikied it :P knew the answer would be no.. you shouldn't have mentioned it was a paradox..
i guess no.. its a paradox right? its related to predicate calculus, discrete structures.. have it for exam this week :)
well say k=y^x then the question reduces to dk/dy.. Anyway happy that you got the answer
